title: [Large-scale] Functional Situationalism-Based Language Learning Design: Exploring Constructivist Alternatives

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of language structures and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Emphasis on analyzing language use contexts and practical application reflecting individual learners' situations

learning_goals: Learners can categorize and explain at least three language learning contexts from a functional situational perspective
Learners can analyze actual language usage cases to design effective communication strategies for specific contexts
Learners can evaluate their own language usage patterns based on peer feedback and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
